#Run with: ~/Downloads/Current_LAMMPS_Build/LAMMPS_Files/build3/lmp -in Argon_0_3c_Script.txt     


#Initialization

units           	metal
dimension       	3
atom_style      	sphere
pair_style      	lj/cut 3.816370964
#pair_style          lj/cut 6.0
boundary		    p p p
#use me for classical: (necessary for longer gr)
#comm_modify         mode single cutoff 13.0 vel yes #made the cutoff longer to accomodate a longer gr
#Use me for relativistic:
#(non modified cutoff) 

#System Definitions


#for 500 atoms, use 28.982 angstroms as box side to get the same density as Rahman. 
region          myreg block 0 28.982 0 28.982 0 28.982
create_box	    1 myreg
create_atoms	1 random 500 341341 myreg

#sampling the tracers alone for the diffusion calculation to avoid making 10GB files for little gain. 
#group           tracers id 100

#Simulation Settings


pair_coeff  	1 1 0.01034 3.4
neigh_modify	every 1 delay 5 check yes

set             type 1 mass 39.95
set             type 1 diameter 0

#set initial velocity spike to 0.000001096c to try and get Rahman Conditions from full cutoff.
#set initial velocity spike to 0.0000009c to try and get Rahman Conditions from 3....  cutoff. gives 90.87 
#set initial velocity spike to 0.00000093c to try and get Rahman Conditions from 3....  cutoff. gives 96.39

#set initial velocity spike to 0.0000009265c to try and get Rahman Conditions from 3....  cutoff. gives 94.6603577863

set    atom 500  vx -346643.059915 vy -734912.084029 vz -385568.642087




#Run settings. 
thermo		    10000
minimize	    1.0e-4 1.0e-6 1000 10000
fix 		    mynve all nve
#timestep 	    0.000001274
#timestep        0.0000000001
timestep        0.000000001

#Running for equilibrium. 
run		        10000000


#MEASUREMENTS. 

#RDF, Energy and V-Dist. 
compute         2 all pe/atom

#Use me for classical regime:
#compute         myRDF all rdf 100 cutoff 10.5 #lengthened cutoff to accomodate this 

#Use me for relativistic:
compute         myRDF all rdf 100

compute         myPE all pe
compute         myKE all ke


dump		    mydmp all atom 1000 dump_e_nr.lammpstrj
dump            newdmp1 all custom 10000 dump.nonrelveloc.txt vx vy vz x y z c_2
dump            newdmp2 all custom 10000 dump.relcorrectioncheck.txt id vx vy vz x y z
fix             myrdf all ave/time 10000 1 100000 c_myRDF[*] file tmp.nonrelrdf.txt mode vector
fix             mype all ave/time 1 1 10000 c_myPE c_myKE file tmp.nonrelenergy.txt mode scalar

#run             10000
run                10000000

#VACF Round 1

compute         myVacf1 all vacf


fix             mytemp1 all ave/time 1 1 100 c_thermo_temp file tmp.nonreltemp1.txt mode scalar
fix             myvacf1 all ave/time 1 1 100 c_myVacf1[4] file tmp.nonrelvacf1.txt mode scalar
fix             mypress1 all ave/time 1 1 100 c_thermo_press file tmp.nonrelpress1.txt mode scalar

#run             10000
run                10000000

#VACF Round 2

compute         myVacf2 all vacf



fix             mytemp2 all ave/time 1 1 100 c_thermo_temp file tmp.nonreltemp2.txt mode scalar
fix             myvacf2 all ave/time 1 1 100 c_myVacf2[4] file tmp.nonrelvacf2.txt mode scalar
fix             mypress2 all ave/time 1 1 100 c_thermo_press file tmp.nonrelpress2.txt mode scalar

#run             10000
run                10000000

#VACF Round 3

compute         myVacf3 all vacf



fix             mytemp3 all ave/time 1 1 100 c_thermo_temp file tmp.nonreltemp3.txt mode scalar
fix             myvacf3 all ave/time 1 1 100 c_myVacf3[4] file tmp.nonrelvacf3.txt mode scalar
fix             mypress3 all ave/time 1 1 100 c_thermo_temp file tmp.nonrelpress3.txt mode scalar

#run             10000
run                10000000

#VACF Round 4

compute         myVacf4 all vacf



fix             mytemp4 all ave/time 1 1 100 c_thermo_temp file tmp.nonreltemp4.txt mode scalar
fix             myvacf4 all ave/time 1 1 100 c_myVacf4[4] file tmp.nonrelvacf4.txt mode scalar
fix             mypress4 all ave/time 1 1 100 c_thermo_press file tmp.nonrelpress4.txt mode scalar

#run             10000
run                10000000

#VACF Round 5

compute         myVacf5 all vacf



fix             mytemp5 all ave/time 1 1 100 c_thermo_temp file tmp.nonreltemp5.txt mode scalar
fix             myvacf5 all ave/time 1 1 100 c_myVacf5[4] file tmp.nonrelvacf5.txt mode scalar
fix             mypress5 all ave/time 1 1 100 c_thermo_press file tmp.nonrelpress5.txt mode scalar

#run             10000
run                10000000
#dump            bigveldump tracers custom 10 dump.nonrelbigveloc.txt vx vy vz
